name: Jamnite
description:
Jamnite made in Unreal Engine Turkey's Game Jam: Jamnite May 2018 and the theme was "Gate". 

A story about a professor that he develops a time machine. 

Game Language: Turkish 

Credits

Story: Sertaç OGAN & Gökhan KAHRAMAN

Modelling & Texturing: Mahir ATAR

Concept Arts:  Gökhan KAHRAMAN

Programming: Eren ÇAYLAK & Sertaç OGAN
